item.title: Seamless Migration of Azure Cloud Services (classic) to Azure Cloud Services (extended support)
item.description: Seamless Migration of Azure Cloud Services (classic) to Azure Cloud Services (extended support) Azure Cloud Services is a widely used Platform as a Service (PaaS) offering that allows you to build, deploy, and manage scalable and highly available web applications and APIs. Recently, Microsoft introduced Azure Cloud Services (extended support), which provides several enhancements over the classic Cloud Services model. This comprehensive guide will walk you through the process of migrating your existing Azure Cloud Services (classic) deployments to the newer Azure Cloud Services (extended support) platform.
